Key Match Events: Geraldo Perdomo made an error on a ground ball hit by Jose Iglesias, allowing the winning run to score in the top of the 9th inning
Pre-Game Insights: The D-backs were in a crucial match against the Mets, looking to avoid being swept and maintain their lead in the National League's Wild Card standings
Post-Match Reflections: The D-backs dropped their second series in their last 13, and their loss kept them 3 1/2 games behind the Dodgers in the NL West
Others: The D-backs have a crucial four-game series against the Dodgers coming up, which will be their last regular-season head-to-head matchup
